name: Blue Flare
description: You unleash an intense and beautiful line of blue flames in a 50 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 5d4 + MOVE fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, they are burned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
